features: CRITICAL: Fixed ALL pricing calculations to be accurate

FIXED: Phone financing properly calculated with promotions
NEW: Insurance calculated per phone line ($18/line)
NEW: iPad and Apple Watch accessory support with financing
FIXED: Taxes calculated correctly (14.44% on service, 7% on devices)
FIXED: Device taxes on full price paid upfront
IMPROVED: Complete pricing logic with all fees and taxes
